stories.text:
Galaxies away from your world, our mission starts here, on the outer edge of the universe. A multi-part journey, waiting to ensnare you in the dramatic grips of battle waged in lands unknown. Our commander, Ben Mauro, one of the greatest creative minds in our system (yes, even us A.I.s can be fans!) will be leading you through the galactic saga entitled Huxley. So... when do you begin? Well, both humans and robots alike are working hand and piston to prepare your mission protocol. The launch is scheduled for October. Check in here to stay informed of any changes. You don’t want to miss this!

Huxley Comics - Digital + Physical

Your mission, documented in 6 exclusive issues. Available for purchase as NFTs and redeemable for physical editions.

Issue 1: The Discovery Available: Friday, October 15th Total Supply of First Editions: 10,000 Price: 0.1 ETH

COMING SOON

Issue 2: The Prisoner Issue 3: The Demon Issue 4: The Guide Issue 5: The Genesis Issue 6: The Metamorphosi

Checkout: https://www.huxleysaga.com/
